meanings.definition: Existing or occurring at the same time or in the same place.
meanings.sent1: The two friends were coextending their laughter during the funny movie.
meanings.sent2: The siblings' birthdays were coextending, so they decided to celebrate together.
meanings.sent3: The cats and dogs were coextending their naps in the warm sun.
meanings.sent4: The colors of the sunset were coextending across the sky, creating a beautiful scene.
meanings.sent5: The students' excitement and anticipation were coextending as they waited for the school trip.

meanings.definition: Extending over the same space or time.
meanings.sent1: The coextending shadows of the trees stretched across the park.
meanings.sent2: The two rivers were coextending for miles before merging into one.
meanings.sent3: The coextending lines on the map made it look like a colorful maze.
meanings.sent4: The coextending melodies of the music intertwined harmoniously.
meanings.sent5: The coextending paths in the forest led to a hidden clearing.
